metadata.greeting: Hey George! Get ready for an awesome weekend! We've got loads of fun planned, including DLR rides, farm animals, and even DINOSAURS! Let's get muddy!

activities.title: Mudchute Farm Adventure
activities.description: Explore London's biggest urban farm! See llamas, sheep, and other farm animals. Perfect for a full day of outdoor fun.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: Mudchute has loads of animals to see and plenty of space to run around, plus it's a great DLR train ride!

transport.fromHackney: Overground to Stratford, then Jubilee line to Canary Wharf, then DLR to Mudchute, 45 mins
transport.tip: Sit at the front of the DLR for amazing driverless train views!

activities.title: Hackney City Farm Fun
activities.description: A small but friendly city farm with pigs, goats, and chickens. Enjoy the cafe and pottery activities.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: Lots of farm animals close to home, plus a chance to see the pigs and chickens up close!

transport.tip: Take the bus and sit on the top deck!

activities.title: Olympic Park Playground Adventure
activities.description: Explore MASSIVE playgrounds, including Tumbling Bay (sand & water). Perfect for running around and getting muddy!
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: Huge outdoor space for running, climbing and exploring, plus sand and water play!

transport.tip: Pack a change of clothes for Tumbling Bay!

activities.title: Victoria Park Fun
activities.description: Two great playgrounds, a deer enclosure, and plenty of space to run around. Enjoy a picnic by the boating lake.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: Two playgrounds to choose from and you can see the deer!

transport.fromHackney: Homerton Overground or Mile End tube, 10 mins
transport.tip: Take some bread to feed the ducks!

activities.title: Young V&A Playtime
activities.description: Dedicated under 5s play area with interactive exhibits and design workshops. Great for sparking creativity!
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: Lots of hands-on activities and a special play area just for little ones!

transport.tip: Check out the design workshops for extra fun!

activities.title: Discover Children's Story Centre
activities.description: Interactive storytelling, dressing up, and character visits. A magical world of books comes to life!
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: Loads of interactive fun and dressing up opportunities!

transport.tip: Check the website for character visit schedules!

activities.title: V&A East Storehouse
activities.description: Explore visible storage displays and see a fascinating collection of objects. It's brand new!
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: You can see all sorts of cool stuff they keep at the museum!

transport.tip: Combine this visit with the Olympic Park!

activities.title: Natural History Museum Dinosaur Adventure
activities.description: See the famous T-Rex skeleton and explore the Dinosaur gallery! Also, check out the Blue Whale in Hintze Hall.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: DINOSAURS! Especially the T-Rex!

transport.fromHackney: Overground to Highbury & Islington, then Victoria line to South Kensington, 45 mins
transport.parking: Limited street parking, congestion charge applies
transport.tip: Go early to avoid the crowds in the Dinosaur gallery!

activities.title: London Transport Museum
activities.description: Climb on old buses & trains, play in the All Aboard zone, and try the tube simulator. Under 18s are FREE with an adult!
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: You can climb on real buses and trains, and even pretend to drive a tube!

transport.fromHackney: Overground to Highbury & Islington, then Victoria line to Oxford Circus, then Central line to Covent Garden, 40 mins
transport.tip: Check out the stamper trail for extra fun!

activities.title: Crystal Palace Park Dinosaurs & Playground
activities.description: See the famous Victorian dinosaur statues on islands! Also has a farm, maze, and a great playground.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: Giant dinosaur statues and a playground!

transport.fromHackney: Overground to Highbury & Islington, then Overground to Crystal Palace, 1 hour
transport.tip: Bring a picnic!

activities.title: Science Museum - The Garden & Flight
activities.description: Explore The Garden (under 5s area), the Flight gallery, and Making the Modern World (TRAINS!).
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: Planes and trains - what more could you want!

transport.fromHackney: Overground to Highbury & Islington, then Victoria line to South Kensington, 45 mins
transport.parking: Limited street parking, congestion charge applies
transport.tip: Book tickets for Wonderlab in advance!

activities.title: RAF Museum
activities.description: See huge aircraft hangers full of planes! There's also a 4D cinema and outdoor playground.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: Loads of real planes to see!

transport.fromHackney: Overground to Highbury & Islington, then Victoria line to Euston, then Northern line to Colindale, 50 mins
transport.tip: Check out the 4D cinema for a thrilling experience!

activities.title: Thames Clippers to Greenwich
activities.description: Take a REAL boat ride down the Thames! Get off at Greenwich and visit the Maritime Museum and playground.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: A real boat ride on the river!

transport.fromHackney: Overground to Shoreditch High Street, then walk to Tower Gateway DLR, then DLR to Tower Gateway and walk to Tower Pier, 40 mins
transport.tip: Sit outside at the back for the best views!

bookAhead.title: Book Ahead
bookAhead.subtitle: Coming up in the next 2-8 weeks

activities.title: Hey Duggee Live
activities.description: The CBeebies favourite comes to life on stage! Earn badges with Duggee and friends.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: Hey Duggee is one of your favourite shows!

transport.tip: Check the venue location before booking!

activities.title: Peppa Pig Live
activities.description: Sing and dance with Peppa Pig and her friends in this fun-filled show.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: You love Peppa Pig!

transport.tip: Check the venue location before booking!

activities.title: Bluey's Big Play
activities.description: See Bluey and Bingo on stage in this brand new show.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: Bluey is one of your favourite shows!

transport.tip: Check the venue location before booking!

activities.title: Dear Zoo Live
activities.description: The classic children's book comes to life on stage with puppets and songs.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: Animals!

transport.tip: Check the venue location before booking!

activities.title: Dinosaur World Live
activities.description: See life-size dinosaur puppets on stage! A thrilling and educational experience.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: LIFE-SIZE DINOSAURS!

transport.tip: Some dinosaurs might be a bit scary, so be prepared!

activities.title: The Tiger Who Came to Tea
activities.description: See the classic children's book come to life on stage.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: You like stories!

transport.tip: Check the venue location before booking!

activities.title: Half Moon Theatre Kids Shows
activities.description: Check out the Half Moon Theatre for a range of children's shows.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: Close by!

transport.fromHackney: Bus to Mile End, then DLR to Limehouse.
transport.tip: Check the venue location before booking!
